mainEntity.name: How do I book a kids school commute with Sahal Cabs?

acceptedAnswer.text: Visit https://sahalcabs.com/book/school and enter your details, or WhatsApp +91-6364636263 for a 90-second guided booking.

mainEntity.name: What safety features does Sahal offer for child rides?

acceptedAnswer.text: ISOFIX child seats, live video monitoring, SOS panic button, and 16-step driver verification. Questions? WhatsApp +91-6364636263.

mainEntity.name: How much is monthly office commute in Bangalore?

acceptedAnswer.text: Pilot pricing: ₹2,999 for Electronic City → Whitefield (22 days). Customize your route via WhatsApp +91-6364636263.

mainEntity.name: Is Sahal available in Mumbai for school pickups?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, routes like Andheri → Bandra. Book at https://sahalcabs.com/book/school or message +91-6364636263 for school-specific plans.

mainEntity.name: Can I cancel a recurring booking?

acceptedAnswer.text: Zero fees with 24-hour notice. Update via app or WhatsApp +91-6364636263 anytime.

mainEntity.name: What if I need a custom route for my kid's tuition?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely – add stops for just ₹800/month extra. Discuss options on WhatsApp +91-6364636263.

mainEntity.name: How do I track my child's ride live?

acceptedAnswer.text: Real-time GPS + video in the Sahal app. Lost access? WhatsApp +91-6364636263 for instant share.

mainEntity.name: What's the discount for first-time bookings?

acceptedAnswer.text: Use code SAHAL2025 for 20% off first month. Apply during booking or ask via WhatsApp +91-6364636263.

mainEntity.name: Do you partner with schools for bulk rides?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, trusted by 150+ like DPS & Vibgyor. PTA heads: WhatsApp +91-6364636263 for free trials.

acceptedAnswer.text: Seamless – use your old account or start fresh. Transition help? WhatsApp +91-6364636263.
